document.full_text: yahoo once touted its pledge to erase search data after 90 days. now it plans to keep the data for longer than its competitors, angering privacy advocates.
document.title: yahoo will keep search queries for 18 months
lines_and_colors: yahoo once touted its pledge to erase search data after 90 days. now it plans to keep the data for longer than its competitors, angering privacy advocates.
